## IGridLayout.nextSquare() method

Returns a squared [LayoutBox](./layout.layoutbox.md) based on this layout's column width. This box will consume `ceil(columnWidth / rowHeight)` rows, but the returned box height might be less to satisfy the square constraint.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
nextSquare(): LayoutBox;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`LayoutBox`
